page.title: 05MUSIC FESTIVAL
page.content: The Junior Music Festival is held every year, schools from all over Malvern take part.They sing, dance and play musical instruments.There is a theme every year.Last year the theme was colour.This year it was European Music Year.Songs from all over Europe.The conductor was Mr. Pollyblank. Schools take turns in performing an act of their own.It is held in the big hall next to the pump rooms.It is 50p a program to come and watch.People from schools who are doing a seperate act have special dressing rooms.
